item.title: CVE-2022-23067|2024-09-16T18:13:10.998Z -- tooljet -- tooljet
item.description: ToolJet versions v0.5.0 to v1.2.2 are vulnerable to token leakage via Referer header that leads to account takeover . If the user opens the invite link/signup link and then clicks on any external links within the page, it leaks the password set token/signup token in the referer header. Using these tokens the attacker can access the userâ€™s account.
